description:
This course is about how to make money buy selling online services to local businesses. This is not a get rich quick scheme. This is a real business that require time and hard work but can be very rewarding. Unlike working at a boring job the earning potential is unlimited. I will show you step by step in getting started in this very lucrative business. Not only that I also included the promotional material that made my business such a success.

This course is over 2.5 hours long
title: Build an Online Business by Helping Other Local Businesses
